item.title: The blakelang programming language
item.description: Why C# is probably my favourite programming language. It strikes just the right balance of “batteries-included” (via a great standard library, performant GC) versus “just let me do it” (unsafe, stackalloc, P/Invoke). But can it be better? After over a decade of writing C# there are still some things I was wishing it had.
